There were actually many items similar to this that I was considering. I decided to go with this one because of the external weights that can be added. The external weights are great! They add a level of awareness that doesn't exist when just doing kegel exercises. There is a sense of activation and engagement that happens at the pelvic floor and up through the layers of internal muscle contraction.

I have a better understanding of how to strengthen my pelvic floor, where I am at and how to get back to a healthy strong foundation.Â Basically when I sneeze now my muscles activate better so I don't pee myself.Â I truly believe the training I am doing with my Kegelbell is worth the 5 minutes every-other day.
